 2024-13952024-12-17JUS
ActOther Than Statutory Authority
PrecisReappointment of MARK ROBERE of Bouctouche, New Brunswick, as a member of the Independent Judicial Advisory Committee for the Province of New Brunswick, to hold office during pleasure for a term of three years.
